column2: Obusosoze mu langi bungi nnyo mu nkambi.

column1: Refugees may return to their countries once the war is over.
column2: Abanoonyiboobubudamu bayinza okuddayo mu nsi zaabwe singa olutalo luba luwedde.

column1: Knowing the number of people helps in planning for refugee camps.
column2: Okumanya omuwendo gw'abantu kiyamba okuteekerateekera enkambi z'abanoonyiboobubudamu.

column1: Senior officials exaggerated the numbers to mismanage funds.
column2: Abakungu ab'oku ntikko baayongeza omuwendo okwezza obuyambi.

column1: There is a high risk in the spread of diseases in camps.
column2: Akatyabaga k'okusaasaana kw'endwadde mu nkambi kali waggulu.

column1: They were relocated to another settlement camp.
column2: Baasengulwa ne batwalibwa mu nkambi endala.

column1: Some people who flee from South Sudan already have their relatives settled in Uganda.
column2: Abantu abamu abava mu South Sudan balina ab'enganda zaabwe abali mu Uganda.

column1: The district officer has advised the people to avoid terling lies.
column2: Omukungu wa disitulikiti awadde abantu amagezi okwewala okulimba.
